Module pipeline
Package tcpassos.pipeline

Interface Pipeline<BEGIN,END>

Type Parameters:
BEGIN - Pipeline input element type
END - Pipeline output element type

The method of this functional interface will return a Optional with the output element or a Optional.empty() if the pipeline is interrupted before reaching the end.

All Superinterfaces:
BasePipeline<BEGIN,Optional<END>>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AtomicPipeline
public interface Pipeline<BEGIN,END> extends BasePipeline<BEGIN,Optional<END>>
Processing pipeline using generics.

    • connect

      default <NEW_END> BranchedPipeline<BEGIN,NEW_END> connect(Collection<Pipeline<END,NEW_END>> next)
      Connects the current pipeline to a collection of next pipelines. Returns a branched pipeline that represents the connection between the current pipeline and the next pipelines.
      Type Parameters:
      NEW_END - the type of the new end of the branched pipeline
      Parameters:
      next - the collection of next pipelines to connect to
      Returns:
      a branched pipeline representing the connection between the current pipeline and the next pipelines

    • connectVoid

      default <NEW_END> Pipeline<BEGIN,NEW_END> connectVoid(BasePipeline<Void,Optional<NEW_END>> nextPipe)

      Type Parameters:
      NEW_END - the type of the new end result
      Parameters:
      nextPipe - the void pipeline to connect to
      Returns:
      a branched pipeline that executes the current pipeline and then the void pipeline
